快速、直观地开发可运营的 GPT 应用。即使是非开发人员也能轻松完成。: Develop operational GPT applications quickly and intuitively. Even non-developers can do it easily.
LangGenius 正在进步成为最好的开源 LLMOps 平台。: LangGenius is progressing to become the best open source LLMOps platform.
Inside announcement text: Cloud service testing before open source!

我愿用苹果全部的技术，去换和苏格拉底共度的一个下午——史蒂夫·乔布斯: The wisdom of Socrates is here to help you solve your problems.
为外文文字工作者提供个性化的翻译工具。: Translation assistant for foreign language writers, providing personalized translation tools.
将代码由一种编程语言翻译成另一种，这基于我们提供的文本生成型 Web App 模: A dedicated programming assistant tha translates your code into another programming language according to your requirements.
扮演前端面试官，为你检验技能水平并针对你的回答给出优化建议。: An AI interviewer that assesses the skills of front-end developers and provides optimization suggestions.
You can build unlimited creative,practic: You can build unlimited creative,practical apps of AI.
简单几步就可以快速生成漂亮的 AI 应用，无需编码完成基于 GPT 的产品，你甚: Create stunning AI applications in just a few simple steps without any coding, build GPT-based products, and even deploy them to Vercel.
省掉后端开发环节，在 LangGenius 上直接部署 WebAPI，基于 Hy: Skip the backend development process and directly deploy WebAPI on LangGenius. Develop powerful applications using HybridPrompt syntax, with individual authentication for each application.
在易用的界面上分析你的应用状态、用量与费用，基于日志标记数据集，持续微调你的模型: Analyze your application's status, usage, and costs on an easy-to-use interface, continuously fine-tune your model based on log-marked datasets, and watch your AI application grow.
释放 GPT 的全部潜力: Unlock the full potential of GPT
基于你的内容训练专属 AI 模型。利用上下文增强能力突破 GPT 的 4096: Train your own AI model based on your content. Break through GPT's 4,096-byte limit with enhanced context capabilities.
最具开创性的 AI 模型，智能语言处理的颠覆性进步。: Advanced AI system for safer and useful responses.
卓越的人工智能对话体验，提供多场景应用支持。: Exceptional AI chat experience for diverse applications.
理解和生成自然语言，支持微调，训练你的 AI 模型。: Understand and generate natural language, fine-tuning enabled.
除了 OpenAI 的 GPT 系列，LangGenius 将陆续支持更多大型语: LangGenius will gradually support more LLMs. We welcome all kinds of suggestions and feedback, and hope you can join us to develop this project in GitHub.
